text:
The President of El Salvador () officially known as the President of the Republic of El Salvador () is the head of state of El Salvador. The office was created in the Constitution of 1841. From 1821 until 1841, the head of state of El Salvador was styled simply as Head of State ("Jefe de Estado").
Living former presidents.
21 Sep 1821 – 28 November 1821 Pedro Barriere (b.... - d. 1827)
Intendant and Governor (from 11 January 1822, President of the Junta of Government)
28 Nov 1821 - 9 February 1823 José Matías Delgado (b. 1767 - d. 1832)
22 Apr 1824 - 1 October 1824
